text: PFC Ludogorets Razgrad () or simply Ludogorets is a Bulgarian football club based in Razgrad. == Honours == Bulgarian Parva Liga: *Winners (13): 2011–12, 2012–13, 2013–14, 2014–15, 2015–16, 2016–17, 2017–18, 2018/19, 2019/20, 2020/21, 2021/22, 2022/23, 2023/24 Bulgarian B Group: *Winners (1): 2010–11 Bulgarian Cup: *Winners (3): 2011-12, 2013–14, 2022/23 Bulgarian Supercup: *Winners (3): 2012, 2014, 2018 * Runners-up (3): 2013, 2015, 2017 === European tournaments === UEFA Europa League *Round of 16 : 2013–14 UEFA Champions League *Group stage : 2014–15, 2016–17 Category:1945 establishments in Europe Category:1940s establishments in Bulgaria Ludogorets
title: PFC Ludogorets Razgrad
